title: The Adventures of Ivan Perry: Hero of Knowledge

story.text: Ivan Perry, a college student majoring in Education, discovers an ancient book in the library that grants him the power to impart instant knowledge to others. Excited, Ivan begins planning how to use his powers to help his peers.

Ivan decides to experiment with his powers by tutoring struggling students at his university. He quickly becomes popular as word spreads about his miraculous ability to help students understand complex topics instantly.
During a tutoring session, Ivan inadvertently shares too much knowledge, causing a student to become overwhelmed. This teaches Ivan the importance of moderation and pacing in learning.
Ivan starts to refine his abilities, figuring out how to control the amount of knowledge transferred. He begins to think of ways to use his power beyond just tutoring.

The local community hears of Ivan's gifts and seeks his help for various educational workshops and seminars. Ivan starts guiding not just students, but also teachers on how to better deliver their content.
A mysterious figure approaches Ivan, expressing interest in his powers for less altruistic purposes. Ivan, determined to use his powers for good, declines the offer and strengthens his resolve.

Reflecting on the week, Ivan realizes the true potential and responsibility of his gift. He decides to expand his horizon to global education, planning to create platforms for accessible learning worldwide.

ending: Ivan Perry continued to spread knowledge, becoming a symbol of educational revolution and a hero to all who sought learning.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and sometimes the greatest heroes are those who empower others.
